I guess I was trying to turn him into a horse fly.
----- Original Message -----
From: <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 29, 2001 3:10 PM
Subject: Re: mutants


> Good job Cyberwolf. You did a much better job with Mustex than I did
> with Megaton but I'll take it from here so far as Mustex is
> concerned. Just one small change. He can't fly so he would have
> gotten his hover-cycle and followed on it. After all he's a Mustang
> not a bird.
>
>  Upon arriving Mustex wasted no time finding Veratis.
> Mustex:O.K. I'm just going to lay my cards on the table. Some how my
> son...Yes you heard me right I refer to him as that... started as a
> baby and is developing the same way humans do. I recently aquired
> this.
>  He holds up the book.
> Mustex:It tell how to polarize energy. As you know there would be 3
> advantages to that:
> 1.Polarizing enrgy is the process of making sparks instead of waiting
> for...(I don't know what they do on Cybertron but I doubt they come
> off an assembly line)
> 2.Appling this to D.N.A. could eventually let you make your own beast
> modes as you go along istead of throwing diffent kinds of D.N.A.
> together or getting it straight from the source.
> 3.This could in a few years lead to an invincible bot(and we'll need
> that long to figue out a catch so he won't be that effective a
> fighter.
>  All you have to do is figure out what it was. The effects over time
> have actually been quite positive. I'm sure you could use this kind
> of knowledge. Besides eventually you're going to run out of
> protoforms, and I'm guessing you're almost out of anything but nulls
> already.
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Ice and Mustex reach the rendevous point where the others are
> waiting.
> >
> > Lunarpine caught Mustex's scent on the ocean breeze as Ice
> aproaches. Ice landed and Lunarpine took a defensive stance. "You
> were followed." He states as Mustex aproaches.
> > "Don't worry love, he's not with the alliance. He says he's a
> friend." Ice answers putting a wing in front of her wolf boyfriend
> before he can react.
> >
> > Mustex lands stepping back cautiously. "I thought we were going
> back to your base." he questions wondering why they stopped.
> > "We will," Ice answers "But I had to meet my friends first to tell
> them whats going on." She could tell that he was confused but she
> couldn't risk radio contact so close to the alliance base to tell the
> other mutants she had company.
> > "We found signs of Silver Scout" Razor Claw interjected setting the
> conversation back on the reason they were there. "She went off in
> that direction." The raptor pointed one of his stumpy arms somewhat
> north.
> > "It would seem that she found one of my old aquaintances"
> Foxfingers interupted the chat, his defenses would keep them hidden
> but he didn't want to take the chance of any dumb luck happening
> again. Ice was hidden but Mustex somehow stumbled onto her. He didn't
> want to chance that anyone else would have that kind of luck.
> >
> > "So what now boss?" Razor Claw asked looking at Ice with eyes of a
> lost puppy. Veratis had put her in charge and as long as his
> commander was present he didn't think for himself.
> > Ice hadn't thought that far ahead, her team wouldn't trust Mustex
> since they didn't know him, and she couldn't jeapordize the mission
> by taking him along. "I'll take him back to base, you three follow
> our leads." She turned and got ready to fly away when she caught
> Razor Claws next thought. "Lunarpines in charge, I'll meet you when
> I'm done." The large white arctic owl spread her wings and flew
> skyward mentally calling back to Mustex "Follow me."
> > Mustex flew skyward behind the owl trying to see behind him that
> the other mutants weren't following them.
>
>
>
